title: Hellbeard Halberd
content:
fernal leviathan, whose facial hair was formed from the weapons of an army it had once vanquished.

Halberd Two-Handed Extra Reach

Hellbeard Halberd is one of the Halberd Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Hellbeard Halberd is a deadly halberd that deals fixed poison damage along its regy. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.).
